Description:
Welcome to Air Hockey in Rocket League!

Required Settings:
- Boost Amount: Unlimited

Recommended Settings:
- Ball Type: Puck
- Ball Size: Large
- Ball Bounciness: Low

The puck (or ball) spawns on top of the bridge, and there is a barrier between the two halfs of the map to divide players.

If you shoot the puck (or ball) through the underpass, the velocity of the puck will be boosted!
